text: BIBD Headquarters in Bandar Seri Begawan Bank Islam Brunei Darussalam is an Islamic Bank in Brunei. Established in 2005 with the merger of Islamic Bank of Brunei and Islamic Development Bank of Brunei, it is based in Bandar Seri Begawan. == References == == External links == Category:Banks of Brunei Category:Banks established in 2005 Category:2005 establishments in Brunei Category:Economy of Brunei
title: Bank Islam Brunei Darussalam
